HomePage.title: Web & Blockchain Engineer
HomePage.subtitle: Building bold digital experiences and decentralized infrastructures.
HomePage.tech_stack_desc: I cover the full Web3 stack: Solidity smart contracts, Node.js/Express backend, and React/Next.js frontend with continuous delivery pipelines.
HomePage.experience_desc: Collaborating with enterprise teams and startups to design and ship dApps focused on security, scalability, and time-to-market.
HomePage.education_desc: My educational path, bridging academia and technical specialization.
HomePage.projects_desc: From UX storytelling for lifestyle brands to building decentralized protocols, a selection of works telling my end-to-end approach.
HomePage.contact_title: Let's talk about your next launch
HomePage.contact_desc: I work with founders and teams wanting fast shipping: dApps, Web3 dashboards, motion UI. Bring your idea or roadmap: I'll get back in 24h with a synthetic plan and next steps.
HomePage.contact_box_desc: Want to collaborate on a Web3 project, a design system, or an MVP with smart contracts? Use the contact section below: form + calendly allow you to book a call in minutes.
HomePage.contact_box_note: Prefer a quick answer? Fill the form: share goals, stack, and deadline, and I'll reply in 24h with a preliminary budget and roadmap.

profile.description: Expert in dApp and smart contract development with React, Solidity, and Node.js. I create Web3 solutions on Ethereum and Polygon with a proactive and result-oriented approach.

highlights.0: Custom dApps and smart contracts on Ethereum & Polygon
highlights.1: ML integration, OpenSea API, and cloud-native infrastructures
highlights.2: End-to-end delivery: design system, frontend, and Node.js backend

description.0: Development of a Polygon dApp to generate custom NFTs with ML/TensorFlow pipeline.
description.1: Implementation of Solidity smart contracts, Node.js/Express backend, and internal APIs integrated with OpenSea.
description.2: React + TypeScript + Tailwind frontend with CI/CD workflow and performance budget.

description.0: Ethereum & Polygon dApps for mobility, digital assets, and loan management.
description.1: Solidity smart contracts with Hardhat, Web3.js integration, and Chainlink VRF.
description.2: React/TypeScript frontend design focusing on UX and security.
